mainSequence.step: Admin creates a new instance of Agencia
Agencia instance is shown to admin
Admin creates a new instance of Furgoneta with attributes: patente, pma
Furgoneta instance is shown to admin
Admin creates a new instance of Vehiculo
Vehiculo instance is shown to admin
Admin creates a new instance of Blindaje
Blindaje instance is shown to admin
Admin creates a new instance of Premium
Premium instance is shown to admin
Admin creates a new instance of Coche with attributes: patente, plazas, categoria, blindaje
Coche instance is shown to admin
Admin calls Agencia's method registrarVehiculo with parameter coche:Vehiculo
Vehiculo coche is added to Agencia's vehiculos list
